content: स्थानकं [स्थान स्वार्थे क] {@--1@} A position, situation. {@--2@} A particular point or situation in dramatic action; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} पताकास्थानक <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--3@} A city, town. {@--4@} A basin. {@--5@} Froth, a kind of scum on spirits or wine. {@--6@} A mode of recitation. {@--7@} A division or section of the Taittirīya, a branch of the {%Yajurveda%}.
